p: The schedule of enrollment, interventions, and assessments in accordance with the SPIRIT 2013 statement is shown in Table 1. The baseline blood pressure is obtained by independent nursing personnel when patients are comfortably seated in surgical wards before the day of surgery. According to the web-based centralized randomization list, patients will take the study medications (either the ACEIs/ARBs or placebo pills) orally on the morning of surgery. The time of study medication will be documented.
